about_the_game:
Dive into the magical realm of "Kittynawa," the first title in the "Pawsome Hidden Cats" series. Play as Shugoshu, a unique character with the ability to talk to cats, and become part of a hand-drawn 2D world brimming with mystery, charm, and interactive exploration.

Uncover the secrets of Kittynawa as you navigate a captivating storyline filled with intriguing characters and hidden lore. Delve into the rivalry between the protector of the Hidden Paw Village and a mysterious white fox yokai. Your journey will be shaped by interactions, discoveries, and the quests you undertake, making each step an integral part of this enchanting adventure.

  • Highly Interactive World: Engage with almost every element of the environment and its inhabitants. Manipulate objects, uncover hidden pathways, and converse with humans to reveal secrets and new quests.

  • Captivating Main Quest: Unravel the mysteries of the hidden temple as you progress through a compelling narrative filled with hidden lore.

  • Quests and Item Collection: Fulfill requests from the cats you discover, adding depth and engagement to your adventure.

  • Rich Mini-Stories: Discover mini-stories with each cat you find, enriching the world's lore and deepening your connection to Kittynawa.

  • Intriguing Puzzles: Challenge yourself with hidden puzzles that add layers of intrigue and satisfaction as you uncover Kittynawa's deepest secrets.

  • Distinctive Art Style: Enjoy a unique line-art graphic style that enhances immersion and sets "Kittynawa" apart.

  • Soothing Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in a meticulously selected soundtrack that complements exploration and mystery.

  • Extensive Achievements: Unlock a variety of achievements by exploring every corner of Kittynawa, rewarding your curiosity and progress.

Embark on an unparalleled journey where every interaction leads to discovery. Play as Shugoshu, who has the extraordinary ability to talk to cats. Unravel the secrets of the hidden temple, complete quests for hidden felines, and immerse yourself in a story that unfolds with each step. "Kittynawa" is not just a game—it's an experience that will captivate and delight.

name: Pawsome Hidden Cats - Kittynawa

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with OpenGL 3.3 Support or better, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Display Resolution 1920 pixels X 1080 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with OpenGL 3.3 Support or better, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal Display Resolution 3840 pixels X 2160 pixels

short_description: Discover "Kittynawa", where hidden cats, quests, and puzzles await in a highly interactive, hand-drawn world. Choose your path, interact with everything, and uncover secrets in this enchanting adventure. Your curiosity is the key!
